law.text:
A tribunal of this state may:
Request a tribunal outside this state to assist in obtaining discovery; and
Upon request, compel a person over which it has jurisdiction to respond to a discovery order issued by a tribunal outside this state.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 29, effective June 24, 2015. -- Contingent effective date repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 20, effective March 23, 1998. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 365, sec. 41, effective upon contingency.
